entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • New Inline Rename text is hard to read in blue theme #60734
  • Intellisense is frustrating in VS2022 for VB #60732
  • XML comments on partial methods aren't merged #60730
  • Date format IntelliSense popup uses local format for en-us #60729
  • C# VS2022 Bug when trying to rename variables in local static functions. #60728
  • Ensure arguments for [MaybeNullWhen] parameters don't contribute top-level nullability to type argument inference #60726
  • Quick Info should merge elements with the same name #60725
  • Consider writing MessagePack resolver that provides ForceTypelessFormatter for Roslyn abstract types #60724
  • Incorrect "IDE0004 Cast is redundant" in ternary involving nullable and Task #60720

Closed

  • Go to implementation for methods on shared base interfaces is broken #60731
  • quick action 'move type to namespace' not available when using c# 10 file scoped namespaces in VS 2022 #59716
    Backlog
  • VS's Go To Definition disassembler handles static interface methods incorrectly #60567
    17.3
  • Find All References doesn't find usages of checked user-defined operators #60216
    17.3
  • Implement interface fixer doesn't spit out `checked` keyword for checked user-defined operators #60214
    17.3
  • VSTypeScriptHandlerTests flaky #60694
  • System.ArgumentException in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.OperationMapBuilder #60424

PullRequests

Created

  • Initial .NET Framework ARM64 support #60735
    Area-Infrastructure
  • add more miscellaneous tests for checked operators #60727
    Area-IDE
  • Clean up IDiagnosticService extension methods #60723
    Area-IDE
  • Update details on "numeric IntPtr" #60722
    Area-Compilers, Documentation

Merged

  • Share the indices we create for files that do not have PP directives in them #60693
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix 'move to namespace' with file scoped namespaces. #60713
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Make heading levels for warning waves documentation consistent #60721
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, Next
  • IDE changes for "Unsigned Right Shift" feature, plus tests. #60689
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - UnsignedRightShift
  • Avoid formatting diagnostics with raw strings #60655
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Address PROTOTYPE comments #60707
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - UnsignedRightShift
  • Fix "top-level statements" feature name to match published name #60692
    Area-IDE, Next
  • NRT enable C# EditorFeatures project. #60716
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Generate static abstract interface members correctly #60618
    Area-IDE, Next
  • handle null compilations in entry point finder #60562
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #60682
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Next
  • Fix FAR on checked operators #60698
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add implement interface support for checked operators and cast operators #60719
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update csc.dll path in launch.json #60663
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Grab bag of UTF8 string support in IDE features #60599
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Allow code actions to retrieve options for any language #60697
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Stop switching /langver to preview for generator tests #60691
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix the KeybindingResetDetector #60494
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix flaky VSTypeScriptHandlerTests #60706
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60718
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Simplifier options #60174
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60737
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #60736
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Refactor entry point finder code #60614
    Area-IDE
  • Add parameters in scope in nameof in certain attributes #60642
    Area-Compilers
  • Add integration test to flag MEF composition breaks #60496
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Relax requirements around second parameter of a user-defined shift operator. #60717
    Area-Compilers
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Enable null on UseExplicitTypeCodeFixProvider #58866
    Area-IDE
  • Support ref field declarations from source and metadata #60416
    Area-Compilers
  • Add FixAll support for code refactorings #59809
    Area-IDE
  • Safely create VirtualCharSequence from string in StackFrameParser #59283
    Area-IDE
  • Allow shared projects to specify a real project to proxy too for building and testing in VS Code #60664
    Area-Infrastructure
